sentences.sContent: Weighing just 6 pounds and standing 14 inches tall, a pinto colt born Friday may be the smallest horse on the planet. He's named Einstein.
sentences.sContent_eng: Weighing just 6 pounds and standing 14 inches tall, a pinto colt born Friday may be the smallest horse on the planet. He's named Einstein.
sentences.sCn: 这匹周五出生的黑白毛色的小马重只有6磅，身高14英寸，可能是这个星球上最小的马了，它的名字叫爱因斯坦。

words.tran: 小马似的；轻佻的；不受拘束的，放浪不拘的
